data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 265,294 believers in Qiqihar and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Qiqihar, Heilongjiang, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 265,294 believers in Qiqihar to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Qiqihar, Heilongjiang, China that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Spirit, help the church in the county of Qiqihar do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Saman people.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Qiqihar, Heilongjiang, China to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 265,294 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of Qiqihar, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

location.name: Qiqihar
location.cities_list: Qiqihar, Bei’an, Hulan Ergi, Zhalantun, Nehe
